titleStmt.title: The Round-heads lecture being a true description of a Round-heads conversation, vvhich you may heare in this following relation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London for Francis Coles, in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: "To the tune of, Neighbour Roger, or, They cannot hold their wits together."
Imperfect: faded print, stained and torn.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
